EmailTemplate.description: Notification is generated whenever user updates the Product Start Date on GMPL/ BX009
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: BX009 whose Product Start Date has been updated
EmailTemplate.subject: The Revenue Start Year on GMPL/ BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The Revenue Start Year has been updated to {!GMPL_BX009__c.Product_Start_Date__c}, on GMPL/ BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}'. Please note that a change in Revenue Start Year also triggers an update on Revenue Forecast. The related BX009 can be access via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks
